title: New: Becoming Sun – Out Of Breath
body:
Snow is such a beautiful and wondrous occurrence, mainly for the way in which it appears to alter landscape formations, yet when it melts and subsides, everything is exactly how it was before.

**Becoming Sun’s** latest track, the at times barely there _Out Of Breath_, appears to document this moment of melting, the revealing of what already existed, exposing it as somehow new and unique. A revival.
